column1: #Text=They have also attacked in the US several times and tried in Canada.
#Text=They have also (mostly) attacked in  Muslim countries against fellow Muslims.
#Text=We need to stop trying to blame socio economic factors.
#Text=These certainly contribute to the problem but are not the source.
#Text=The use/misuse of the Islamic religion is the source.
#Text=The socio economic climate in which the recruits live may make them more susceptible to recruitment.
#Text=Bu then the poor and disenfranchised everywhere would be blowing themselves and others up.
